content.en: Carbon stock estimation: Scientists have been using machine learning algorithms to accurately estimate aboveground carbon stock in forests. These algorithms, such as support vector machines, boosted regression trees, and random forests, are able to analyze multi-temporal satellite data and provide accurate estimates of carbon stock. By combining different data sources and using various algorithms, researchers are improving their ability to estimate forest aboveground biomass in different regions around the world.
content.da: Kulstoflagerestimering: Forskere har brugt maskinlæringsalgoritmer til nøjagtigt at estimere overjordisk kulstoflager i skove. Disse algoritmer, såsom support vector machines, boosted regression trees og random forests, kan analysere multi-temporale satellitdata og levere præcise estimater af kulstoflager. Ved at kombinere forskellige datakilder og bruge diverse algoritmer, forbedrer forskerne deres evne til at estimere skovs overjordiske biomasse i forskellige regioner rundt om i verden.
